wikitext.*:
'''Michael N. Stanton''' ([[25 July]] [[1938]] - [[15 December]] [[2011]]<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://awrichfuneralhome.frontrunnerpro.com/runtime/18870/runtime.php?SiteId=18870&NavigatorId=117646&op=tributeObituary&viewOpt=dpaneOnly&ItemId=1057907&LinkId=221|articlename=Obituary for Michael Stanton|dated=|website=[http://www.awrichfuneralhomes.com/ W Rich Funeral Home]|accessed=19-December-2011}}</ref>) was Professor Emeritus of English at the University of Vermont. He was the author of ''[[Hobbits, Elves, and Wizards]]'' and contributed numerous articles to the ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia]]''. Stanton also contributed to ''[[Tolkien in New Zealand]]'' and ''[[Tolkien and the Modern Middle Ages]]'' among various other papers and lectures.
